newsitem.title: ITALY: VERONA JULY AIR CARGO TRAFFIC DOWN 20.4 PCT.
newsitem.headline: VERONA JULY AIR CARGO TRAFFIC DOWN 20.4 PCT.

text.p: Verona airport handled 459 tonnes of flown air cargo traffic in July 1997, down 20.4 percent on the same period last year the airport authority said.
In January-July 97 the total cargo handled showed a slight increase of 1.4 percent with exports up 7.0 percent confiming the growth of industrial production in north-east Italy.
